paper::SYNAPSE_REGISTER ( paper_ChangeAuth  )

Change authentication and authorisation info.

  • key The key to change or add. Specify an empty key to set the default rights.
  • rights See CpaperClient::getInfo
paper::SYNAPSE_REGISTER ( paper_Login  )

Try to authenticate and join a client to a paper.

Can also be used to reauthenticate.

  • objectId The paper to login to.
  • key The key to authenticate with.
Sends: object_Client
When authentication succeeded. Send to all connected clients to indicate a new client has joined. Filled with info from CpaperClient::getInfo
Sends reply: paper_AuthWrongKey
When authentication has failed.
paper::SYNAPSE_REGISTER ( paper_Create  )

Client wants new paper.

  • moveClients set this to one to move all the clients to the new paper.
Note:
After creating, the creator has temporary owner rights. Dont forget to assign some kind of permanent key, otherwise the drawing will be unaccesible.
Sends: object_Client
Send to inform all the other clients of this new one Filled with parameters from CpaperObject::getInfo
Sends: object_Joined
When moveClients is set to 1 it will send this to all clients. Filled with parameters from CpaperObject::getInfo
